projects.title: Fraud Detection from Banking Sector using Machine Learning
projects.description: Predicted fraud from the new transactions based on 30 features after exploration and analysis of the transaction data with 280000+ points Achieved accuracy of 89% by ensembling based Random Forest Classifier &Local OF on the balanced &unbalanced datasets respectively. Compared the results of various classification models including the Naive Bayes classifier, Support Vector Machines, K-Nearest Neighbours. Benchmarked the result of simple machine learning-based algorithms against the result of advanced density-based algos DBSCAN &LOCI

projects.title: Oxidative stress of Entamoeba Histolytica
projects.description: â€¢Studied how the diarrhea-causing parasite Entamoeba histolytica is able to survive in the human body in presence of oxygen even though the parasite dies in presence of oxygen in normal conditionâ€¢Determined two mechanisms to the energy production for organism's survival inside the human body.â€¢If we inhibit the mechanisms that lead to energy production we may be able to cure the disease.

projects.title: Drug target in leishmania parasite
projects.description: â€¢Studied the possible pathways which will help in developing the vaccine against kala-azar or Black Fever leishmaniasis.â€¢Reviewed different pathways to find out specific enzymes that will have antileishmanial properties to develop vaccines against the parasite.
